thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 21 of 97
thread.title: Mark Scheithauer

author: Mark Scheithauer
title: Mark Scheithauer
text: Biblo's service is fast, accurate and kept me informed of the progress of my transactions. The books were adequately described, and the merchants involved were quick to respond to my questions about the items . When one merchant could not find the volume I had ordered, he was quick to explain and apologize for the inconvenience. All my other books were marvelously well packed and protected, shipped expeditiously and I was advised of the shipping, with a link to track the item. It was an easy and convenient experience, like the others I have had with them, and it's why I continue to go back to Biblo again and again.
